user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, reliable, and high-quality everyday clothing that I could wear with confidence.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to the product because of its promise of extra softness and comfort, which is essential for everyday wear. The plush-backed waistband and tag-free design were particularly appealing, as they addressed my need for comfort and reliability. The classic colors and the fact that it is made from 100% cotton also influenced my decision, as I value quality materials in my clothing.

I chose this product due to its reputation for affordability and high quality. The emphasis on a smooth and comfortable fit was important to me, as I wanted something that I could wear daily without discomfort. The consistent sizing and the brand's focus on long-lasting clothing also played a significant role in my decision, as I prefer to invest in items that I can rely on.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value features such as moisture-wicking materials, soft fabrics, and designs that provide ease of movement. I appreciate items that are versatile for different occasions, whether casual or work-related, and I tend to favor brands that focus on quality and long-lasting wear. Additionally, I enjoy products that have thoughtful details, like reinforced areas for durability and a comfortable fit that doesn't dig or chafe. Overall, I look for reliable, comfortable clothing that meets my everyday needs.

I prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value features such as moisture-wicking materials, soft fabrics, and designs that provide ease of movement.
What specific features or qualities are important to you when it comes to lingerie, such as fabric types, styles, or specific functionalities?
I look for lingerie that offers extra softness and comfort, with features like plush-backed waistbands and tag-free designs. Quality materials like 100% cotton are essential to me.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Bikini Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable> / Item ID: B0BQC2NRG2 / Price: $9.48 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Fruit of the Loom super soft heather bikinis come in the same classic colors you love, and we’ve rebuilt them from the bottom up. Now woven with finer yarn, they’re extra soft to the touch. For added comfort, we’ve added a plush-backed waistband that’s guaranteed to be ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom panties are tag-free and made with a 100% cotton liner for extra softness. The classic bikini silhouette sits slightly above the hips and offers reliable coverage throughout the day.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
